Author: Clover
Name: Immersive Flavor Text
Punchline: It provides more immersive flavor text.
Description:
My garbage quality plugin to help me learn how to work with Dalamud.
Somewhat of a RP toolkit, so far it only provides immersive flavor text.

/pickpocket : Pickpockets target for random amount of gil.
/setpose #, /spose # : Specify a number to set your idle animation pose.
/immersiveconfig : Opens up the config window.
/suggestion : Open up the temperature suggestion window.
